sub_title: Senior Researcher at Anton de Kom Universiteit van Suriname
summary:
Enthusiastic geosientist with trans-disciplinary background and specialized in high pressure/high temperature deformations and microstructural analysis.

Expert for working with the artisanal small-scale gold mining sector and implementing environmentally responsible gold mining techniques for small-scale miners.

Experienced in exploration geology (gold), sampling techniques, mineral processing (gold), soil science, electrical resistivity for earth science, mapping, hydrogeology, particle size analysis combined with gold distribution, and financial feasibility for small-scale gold miners. Also experienced in working in different countries with different cultures.
